languages.text: {n}Эдельтрад — мужчина лет тридцати на вид, плотно скрученный сноп жил, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантов{/g} и обтянутых пергаментной кожей костей. Нервно подергивающиеся пальцы, легкий тик, исказивший лицо, резкие движения — налицо все признаки некой болезни или изъяна, подчинившего себе физическую оболочку человека.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Эдельтрад — мужчина лет тридцати на вид, сплотно скрученный сноп жил, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантов{/g} и обтянутых пергаментной кожей костей. Нервно подергивающиеся пальцы, легкий тик, исказивший лицо, резкие движения — налицо все признаки некой болезни или изьяна, подчинившего себе физическую оболочку человека.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Your first impression of Edelthrad, who appears to be about thirty years old, is of parchment-like skin stretched over a tightly bundled mass of sinew, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, and bone. The nervously twitching fingers, the face twisted by a slight tic, and the jerky movements are all signs of some illness or defect that has taken over his physical form.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Эдельтрад — мужчина лет тридцати на вид, плотно скрученный сноп жил, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}имплантов{/g} и обтянутых пергаментной кожей костей. Нервно подергивающиеся пальцы, легкий тик, исказивший лицо, резкие движения — налицо все признаки некой болезни или изъяна, подчинившего себе физическую оболочку человека.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad looks about thirty years old, resembling a tightly bundled sheaf of sinew, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, and bones wrapped in parchment-like skin. Nervously twitching fingers, face twisted by a slight tic, abrupt body movements — those are all signs of some illness or defect that has taken over this person's physical form.{/n}

{n}Edelthrad looks about thirty years old, resembling a tightly bundled sheaf of sinew, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, and bones wrapped in parchment-like skin. Nervously twitching fingers, face twisted by a slight tic, abrupt body movements — those are all signs of some illness or defect that has taken over this person's physical form.{/n}

The nervously twitching fingers, the face twisted by a slight tic, and the jerky movements are all signs of some illness or defect that has taken over his physical form.{/n}

{n}Your first impression of Edelthrad, who appears to be about thirty years old, is of parchment-like skin stretched over a tightly bundled mass of sinew, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, and bone. The nervously twitching fingers, the face twisted by a slight tic, and the jerky movements are all signs of some illness or defect that has taken over his physical form.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你对艾德萨德的第一印象是，他似乎有三十岁左右，羊皮纸一样的皮肤下面覆着结实的肌肉、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}与骨头。无论是他紧张抽动的手指，由于轻微抽搐而变得扭曲的脸，还是生硬的动作，都意味着他的身体带有某种疾病或缺陷。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your first impression of Edelthrad, who appears to be about thirty years old, is of parchment-like skin stretched over a tightly bundled mass of sinew, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, and bone. The nervously twitching fingers, the face twisted by a slight tic, and the jerky movements are all signs of some illness or defect that has taken over his physical form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你对艾德萨德的第一印象是，他似乎有三十岁左右，羊皮纸一样的皮肤下面覆着结实的肌肉、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}与骨头。无论是他紧张抽动的手指，由于轻微抽搐而变得扭曲的脸，还是生硬的动作，都意味着他的身体带有某种疾病或缺陷。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu primera impresión de Edelthrad, que parece tener unos treinta años, es que su piel parece un pergamino estirado sobre una masa compacta de nervios, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} y huesos. Los movimientos involuntarios de sus dedos, el ligero tic de su cara y sus movimientos bruscos son todos muestra de que una enfermedad o un defecto que se ha apoderado de su forma física.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your first impression of Edelthrad, who appears to be about thirty years old, is of parchment-like skin stretched over a tightly bundled mass of sinew, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, and bone. The nervously twitching fingers, the face twisted by a slight tic, and the jerky movements are all signs of some illness or defect that has taken over his physical form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu primera impresión de Edelthrad, que parece tener unos treinta años, es que su piel parece un pergamino estirado sobre una masa compacta de nervios, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} y huesos. Los movimientos involuntarios de sus dedos, el ligero tic de su cara y sus movimientos bruscos son todos muestra de que una enfermedad o un defecto que se ha apoderado de su forma física.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたのエデルスラドの第一印象は、30才前後の年齢に見受けられ、羊皮紙のような皮膚が固くしまった腱、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}、骨の塊の上に張られているというものだ。神経質にピクピクする指、かすかなチックで曲がった顔、ぎくしゃくした動きはすべて、彼の肉体を乗っ取った何らかの病気または欠陥の兆候だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your first impression of Edelthrad, who appears to be about thirty years old, is of parchment-like skin stretched over a tightly bundled mass of sinew, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, and bone. The nervously twitching fingers, the face twisted by a slight tic, and the jerky movements are all signs of some illness or defect that has taken over his physical form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたのエデルスラドの第一印象は、30才前後の年齢に見受けられ、羊皮紙のような皮膚が、固くしまった腱、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}、骨の塊の上に張られているというものだ。神経質にピクピクする指、かすかなチックで曲がった顔、ぎくしゃくした動きはすべて、彼の肉体を乗っ取った何らかの病気または欠陥の兆候だ。{/n}
{n}あなたのエデルスラドの第一印象は、30才前後の年齢に見受けられ、羊皮紙のような皮膚が固くしまった腱、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}、骨の塊の上に張られているというものだ。神経質にピクピクする指、かすかなチックで曲がった顔、ぎくしゃくした動きはすべて、彼の肉体を乗っ取った何らかの病気または欠陥の兆候だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au premier abord, Edelthrad, qui semble avoir une trentaine d'années, vous fait l'effet d'une peau parcheminée tendue sur un amas étroit de tendons, d'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} et d'os. Les doigts qui se contractent nerveusement, le visage tordu par un léger tic et les mouvements incontrôlés sont autant de signes d'un mal ou d'un dysfonctionnement qui s'est emparé de son enveloppe corporelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your first impression of Edelthrad, who appears to be about thirty years old, is of parchment-like skin stretched over a tightly bundled mass of sinew, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, and bone. The nervously twitching fingers, the face twisted by a slight tic, and the jerky movements are all signs of some illness or defect that has taken over his physical form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au premier abord, Edelthrad, qui semble avoir une trentaine d'années, vous fait l'effet d'une peau parcheminée tendue sur un amas étroit de tendons, d'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} et d'os. Les doigts qui se contractent nerveusement, le visage tordu par un léger tic et les mouvements incontrôlés sont autant de signes d'un mal ou d'un dysfonctionnement qui s'est emparé de son enveloppe corporelle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein erster Eindruck von Edelthrad, der etwa dreißig Jahre alt sein dürfte, ist ein gut geschnürtes Bündel aus Sehnen, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantaten{/g} und Knochen, eingewickelt in pergamentähnliche Haut. Seine Finger zucken nervös, er hat leichte Krämpfe im Gesicht, und seine Bewegungen sind abgehackt – alles Symptome einer Krankheit oder eines Defekts, der seinen Körper beherrscht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your first impression of Edelthrad, who appears to be about thirty years old, is of parchment-like skin stretched over a tightly bundled mass of sinew, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g}, and bone. The nervously twitching fingers, the face twisted by a slight tic, and the jerky movements are all signs of some illness or defect that has taken over his physical form.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein erster Eindruck von Edelthrad, der etwa dreißig Jahre alt sein dürfte, ist ein gut geschnürtes Bündel aus Sehnen, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantaten{/g} und Knochen, eingewickelt in pergamentähnliche Haut. Seine Finger zucken nervös, er hat leichte Krämpfe im Gesicht, und seine Bewegungen sind abgehackt – alles Symptome einer Krankheit oder eines Defekts, der seinen Körper beherrscht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Otuzlu yaşlarda gibi görünen Edelthrad'a baktığında ilk izlenimin, parşömen benzeri bir tenin sıkı sıkıya bir araya getirilmiş bir kas, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} ve kemik yığınının üstüne gerildiği şeklinde oluyor. Gerginlikle seğiren parmaklar, hafif bir tikle çarpılan yüz ve ani hareketler fiziksel formunu pençesine almış bir hastalık veya kusura dalalet.{/n}
